keyFacts: The invoice details shipping charges totaling $377.64 for various shipments made by Jeffrey E. Epstein.
Multiple shipments were picked up and delivered between December 23, 2002, and January 10, 2003.
The invoice includes discounts applied to the shipping charges, totaling $11.31.
Several individuals are listed as recipients for the shipments sent by Epstein, indicating a network of associates.
The document contains multiple references to FedEx services and specific tracking IDs for the shipments.
